CoverageCalculatorFactory¶

class orbitpy.coveragecalculator.CoverageCalculatorFactory[source]¶

Factory class which allows to register and invoke the appropriate coverage calculator class.

The following classes are registered in the factory:

  • GridCoverage

  • PointingOptionsCoverage

  • PointingOptionsWithGridCoverage

  • SpecularCoverage

Additional user-defined coverage calculator classes can be registered as shown below:

Usage:

factory = orbitpy.CoverageCalculatorFactory()
factory.register_coverage_calculator('Custom Coverage Finder', CoverageFinder) # CoverageFinder is the user class
cov_calc = factory.get_coverage_calculator('CoverageFinder')
Variables

_creators (dict) – Dictionary mapping coverage type label to the appropriate coverage calculator class.

Methods Summary

__init__()

get_coverage_calculator(specs)

Function to get the appropriate coverage calculator instance.

register_coverage_calculator(_type, creator)

Function to register coverage calculators.

Methods Documentation

__init__()[source]¶
get_coverage_calculator(specs)[source]¶

Function to get the appropriate coverage calculator instance.

Variables

specs – Coverage calculator specifications which also contains a valid coverage calculator type in the “@type” dict key. The coverage calculator type is valid if it has been registered with the CoverageCalculatorFactory instance.

Returns

The appropriate coverage calculator object initialized to the input specifications.

Return type

orbitpy.coveragecalculator.GridCoverage or orbitpy.coveragecalculator.PointingOptionsCoverage or orbitpy.coveragecalculator.PointingOptionsWithGridCoverage or custom coverage calculator class.

register_coverage_calculator(_type, creator)[source]¶

Function to register coverage calculators.

Variables

  • _type (str) – Coverage calculator type (label).

  • creator (Coverage calculator class.) – Coverage calculator class.
